724837f-a.text:
Worth Street, Centre Street, to Mission Place.
(After Reconstruction).
President Borough of Manhattan.
August 2, 1920.
724837f-a.folder: Worth Street & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY

719751f-a.text:
(1)
Foley Square, (in the foreground,) showing the new State Building, on Centre Street, north from and including Worth Street, to, and including Leonard Street. Also shown is Worth Street, east from and including Centre Street, to, but not including Baxter Street.
March 26, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2) The same view, from a different angle.
March 26, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(31
The same view, from a different angle, showing the site for the new Department of Health Building. The view also shows Leonard Street, south side, from and including Centre Street, to and including Baxter Street.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
719751f-a.folder: Centre Street & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

719739f-a.title: Manhattan: Foley Square - Centre Street
719739f-a.text:
Foley Square (unofficially called Court House Square,) north from Duane Street, at the intersection of Centre, Lafayette, Pearl and Duane Streets. Buildings as seen from left to right are the Tombs, New York State Building, The New York County Court House and the old building of the Department of Health.
About 1930.
Ewing Galloway.
719739f-a.folder: Foley Square & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY

724838f-a.text:
Worth Street, west from and including Centre Street.  On the extreme right, appears a portion of the N.Y. State Building.

October 22, 1932
P. L. Sperr.
724838f-a.folder: Worth Street & Centre Street, Manhattan, NY

719735f-a.text:
Foley Square The New York State Bldg. as viewed eastward from lafayette at Worth Streets. This structure,No. 80 Centre Street, is also bounded, by Worth, Leonard and Baxter Streets and was the first building erected here of this civic center. The latest is the Board of Health structure and is seen on the left. To the right appears a
portion of the New York County Court House.
June 12, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
719735f-a.folder: Centre Street & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

718567f-b.text:
(1) Centre Street, west side, north from Worth Street. This view
shows the tombs.
February 24, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, from a different angle, showing a further view north on Centre Street. Also shown is Leohard Street, west from Centre, to and including Lafayette Streets. Included also is Lafayette Street, west side, north from but not including Leonard, to but not including Franklin Streets. In the foreground is shown a clearance for the Department of Health Building.
March 27, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
718567f-b.folder: Centre Street & Worth Street, Manhattan, NY

719749f-b.title: Manhattan: Foley Square - Centre Street
719749f-b.text:
(1) Foley Square, east side, showing the old Department of Health Building, at Centre and Duane Streets.
June 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(2) The same, showing a close up of the front of the old Department of Health Building.
June 11, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
(3) The same as No. 1, at a later date, showing the new Federal Courts Building, occupying the site of the old Department of Health Building.
About 1935.
Gift of Dr. Michael Wishengrad, A.R.P.S.
